short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A desktop interface for your web browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use the Chrome extension to fasten the process of saving & managing tabs, groups, and sessions.

Sava OS helps you to manage, filter, share, and organize your online data in a familiar environment.

You can learn more on our website: https://savaos.com/

Please note that a Sava OS account is required for the extension to work.
